What happens when the last hope of the world is in danger would not in the hands of the heroes in shining armor, and in the hands of a gang of criminals and the dregs of society? Game Blackguards, a new turn-based strategy RPG, answers this question. You will discover 180 unique hexagonal cards that serve battlefield. On each of them you will find a dark and tangled history of crime associated with drug trafficking and murder. Play as a warrior, mage or hunter skills of your character and choose at will. Exciting campaign tells the story of doubt, betrayal and loss. That is, you specify the course of history in key plot twists and determine the outcome of events.






Features

3. Play. Installing client Steam (only to holders of a license key)
